Description: Disc-shaped spindle-whorl made of limestone with a half circular section and a flat base. The limestone is very soft and sheds material. Almost half of the edge is broken off. The diameter of the perforation is 0.9 cm.
Findspot: Excavated/Findspot: Amara West (Nubia), E13.2, AAf, level 2
Bibliographic references: Spencer 1997 / Amara West I, The Architectural Report (p. 202)
